comments:
When closing Eclipse I received a Mylar Error saying
Mylar Task List stop failed:

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
at org.eclipse.core.runtime.ListenerList.remove(ListenerList.java:141)
at org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager.removeListenerObject(EventManager.java:99)
at org.eclipse.ui.preferences.ScopedPreferenceStore.removePropertyChangeListener(ScopedPreferenceStore.java:582)
at org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.tasklist.MylarTaskListPlugin.stop(MylarTaskListPlugin.java:329)

-----
I also had an error when starting Eclipse (3.2M6):

"Task List initialization failed":

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.tasklist.MylarTaskListPlugin$5.run(MylarTaskListPlugin.java:295)
at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:35)

The problem seems to be with Mylar not starting up properly.

What version of Eclipse is this?  I assume you're running Mylar 0.4.10?
That's the problem--Mylar 0.4.10 does not support the 3.2M6 so you will need the latest dev build.  I'm going to update the web site to make this more clear.
